title: ‘It Was Instinct’: Pogačar Tightens Grip on Tour de France With ‘Perfect’ Tactical Masterpiece
content:
'I’m having fun and enjoying this moment until it lasts:' Slovenian slayer in ‘killer mode’ finishes off superb UAE setup to smash to victory.

Read the full article at ‘It Was Instinct’: Pogačar Tightens Grip on Tour de France With ‘Perfect’ Tactical Masterpiece on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
